dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 191 IH: Inflation Reduction Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself, Mr. Burlison, Mr. Perry, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Biggs of Arizona, Mr. Cloud, Ms. Hageman, Mr. Brecheen, Mr. Crane, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Self, Mrs. Luna, Mr. Roy, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Mr. Zinke, and Mr. Tiffany) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Agriculture, Natural Resources, Financial Services, Science, Space, and Technology, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To repeal the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Inflation Reduction Act of 2025.

section.header: Repeal of Inflation Reduction Act of 2022

subsection.text: Public Law 117–169 (commonly referred to as the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022) is repealed.
The unobligated balances of any amounts made available under Public Law 117–169 are rescinded.
